name: Pong Invader (Pan2)
description:
I decided to combine Space Invaders and Pong because why not?

The goal is to get the ball on the other's side, you can shoot the others shield/paddle to give them a disadvantage. If you get shot enough time or hit with the ball, you die for that round. 

Controls: 
  • Red: a/d to move, s to shoot.
  • Green: 🡐/🡒 to move, 🡑 to shoot.

The game is 2 player only at the moment.
